summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of FAIRVIEW AVENUE NORTH, from Denny Way to Valley Street on the east; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by the installation of a street lighting system, together with ornamental street signs; all in accordance with Resolution No. 10717 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvements be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds."
